caption.center: JEFFERY T. SOLOMON, Appellant, v. STATE OF FLORIDA, Appellee.

court.center: District Court of Appeal of Florida, First District.

opinion.posture: An appeal from the Circuit Court for Duval County, Hugh A. Carithers, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
Jeffery T. Solomon, pro se, Appellant.
Bill McCollum, Attorney General, Tallahassee, for Appellee.
opinion.opinion_text:
AFFIRMED.
BARFIELD, KAHN, and PADOVANO, JJ., CONCUR.
NOT FINAL UNTIL TIME EXPIRES TO FILE MOTION FOR REHEARING AND DISPOSITION THEREOF IF FILED.
